attributes.action: Politicians must pay full UK tax on their investments.
attributes.additional_details:
If politicians don't support the UK economy are they truly UK citizens? Nor can they actually have the UK as a country's best interests at heart.

After all if they or their companies are not responsible for supporting the systems they implement do they deserve to be in their honourable positions.
attributes.background: Politicians and members of the government are public servants. If they have a vested interest in using their position of privilege to avoid paying as much tax as an average person in the UK.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Politicians are subject to the same tax laws as anyone else.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the change you would like to see to the law on taxation.
